scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && rm -rf dev/img/icons && rm -rf dev/imgResized
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run copy && npm run git:add && npm run git:commit && npm run git:push
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:pre && npm run build:replace && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:html && npm run build:post
scripts.build:pre: npm install;npm run resizeImages && npm run makeIcons && mkdir -p dist; cp -r dev/* dist; cp dev/.htaccess dist;
scripts.build:html: html-minifier-terser --input-dir dist --output-dir dist --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace --minify-css true --minify-js true --file-ext html
scripts.build:css: uglifycss dist/w3.css dist/styles.css --ugly-comments --output dist/styles.min.css && npm run purgecss
scripts.git:commit: cd ../$npm_package_name && read -p 'Zadejte commit zprávu: ' msg && git commit -m "$msg"
